page.title: 11Industries
page.content: On the Talargoch Industrial Estate they manufacture Double glazing units -Double Shield, Furniture-Woodcraft, Storage equipment-David Sellors and Precision tools-Oak Engineering.Other manufacturers make pies or cold meats- G and G Meats or sell Peter Hurst Pies throughout North Wales.Dean and Poole sell crisps and biscuits.Panelkraft service and repair damaged vehicles. Parker Wools sell wool.There is a Discount Carpet Warehouse a Haulage Company and A+N who sell tyres. Nearby are JP Oils, The Hughes Roofing Supplies Warehouse and The Ready Mix Concrete Works. In Dyserth, Insulec specialise in electrical insulation, they are the agents for UK, European and American companies. Sewtex manufacture filter and sell filtration machines for the catering industry.
